related.meaning: now (when it is already much too late)

lessons.japanese: 君はあんな夜更けに私に電話をかける必要はなかったのに。
lessons.english: You need not to have called me up so late at night.

lessons.japanese: 我々は夜更けまで語り合った。
lessons.english: We talked late into the night.

lessons.japanese: 我々は夜更けまでその問題について議論した。
lessons.english: We discussed the problem far into the night.

lessons.japanese: こんな夜更けに女の子の一人歩きは危ない。
lessons.english: It is not safe for a girl to go out by herself so late at night.

lessons.japanese: 彼はしばしば夜更けまで読書する。
lessons.english: He often reads far into the night.
